description: Charming 3-bedroom semi-detached family home near Petts Wood station.
longDescription: An attractive three-bedroom semi-detached family home situated just 0.5 miles from Petts Wood station. The property features a spacious 18ft kitchen/breakfast room, two bright reception rooms, and a sun-filled conservatory. Ideally located for fast trains to London and within the catchment area for top-rated local schools.

description: Immaculate 2-bedroom garden flat with bi-folding doors.
longDescription: Presented in excellent decorative order, this two-bedroom, two-bathroom garden flat offers the perfect blend of modern living and outdoor space. The open-plan living area features solid wood floors and a sleek fitted kitchen with integrated appliances. Bi-folding doors open onto a secluded private courtyard, perfect for summer dining.

description: Stunning 4-bed Victorian terrace in the heart of Peckham village.
longDescription: A characterful Victorian terraced house located on one of Peckham's most desirable streets. This 4-bedroom home boasts original fireplaces, a recently renovated kitchen-diner, and a generous rear garden. Just moments from the independent shops and cafes of Bellenden Road and excellent transport links.

description: Authentic warehouse loft conversion with exposed brickwork.
longDescription: Live in the heart of London's creative district in this stunning warehouse conversion. The apartment features soaring high ceilings, authentic exposed brick walls, and massive industrial-style windows. Residents enjoy exclusive access to a rooftop terrace with panoramic views of the City skyline.

description: Prestigious 5-bedroom detached residence adjacent to Wimbledon Common.
longDescription: A truly exceptional detached family home offering over 2,500 sq ft of luxury living space. Highlights include a grand master suite with walk-in wardrobe, a state-of-the-art kitchen, and a double garage. The beautifully landscaped rear garden offers total privacy, all within walking distance of Wimbledon Village.

location: George Street, East Croydon, London, CR0
description: Contemporary 2-bed apartment with skyline views, steps from the station.
longDescription: Perfect for commuters, this ultra-modern apartment is located less than a 2-minute walk from East Croydon station (15 mins to London Victoria). Features include a high-spec open-plan kitchen, concierge service, and a private balcony with stunning sunset views over the city.

location: Albert Street, Camden Town, London, NW1
description: Rare architect-designed detached bungalow in a quiet conservation area.
longDescription: A unique opportunity to acquire a detached bungalow in the heart of Camden. Tucked away on a quiet residential street, this renovated gem features smart-home heating, engineered oak flooring, and a private patio. Just a short stroll from the vibrant Camden Lock Market and Regent's Canal.
